p: Purchase intention is defined as the likelihood of a consumer purchasing a given product. A higher purchase intention indicates an increase in purchase probability [ 46, 47, 48, 49, 50]. Marketers have long argued that purchase intention can be used to accurately forecast purchase behavior [ 51, 52, 53]. Moreover, previous studies have explored product knowledge [ 54, 55, 56, 57], food neophobia [ 41, 58, 59, 60], and purchase intention. In this study we define the definition of purchase intention as a customerâ€™s intention to purchase insect food.
